section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Barclay focuses on the registration, sourcing and formulation of herbicides and fungicides for the European market. Understanding and fulfilling the needs of our customers on a local and European level using the highest quality standards and dedicated service. 
 
Our mission is to: 
­-Provide agronomic performance for the grower and a low risk margin opportunity for customers 
­-Obtain independent product registrations 
­-Source the best raw materials globally 
-­Ensure complete traceability along our supply chain
